CatDescriptText: Mr. C.S. Anthony, 1538 Centre Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 7, 1958, pg. 3 with question: �Do you think adults in the community are doing enough to foster constructive recreational activities, like playgrounds, centers, places to dance, Little Leagues, etc., for youth?� answer reads: �No, I don�t think so. If they were, the kids wouldn�t have time to get into trouble and do the things which are so detrimental to all.�
TitMainTitle: Portrait of C.S. Anthony, wearing cap, eyeglasses, moustache, and dark zippered jacket, holding paper bag and coat over left arm, standing in front of block wall, man wearing striped jacket on left, and store window on right
